title: Supply Planning and Analytics
description: Predictive analytics will be used to optimize various business metrics including improving efficiency of our workforce. The SP&A team uses cutting edge technology, data science and machine learning to forecast demand and analyse risks long before the season starts with a focus on business and customer experience.
